overview.title: Our Story
overview.founded: Founded in 1999, 5R Associates has been serving clients for over 26 years with dedication, quality, and professionalism.
overview.description: We specialize in construction, interior design, and painting services for residential properties and non-commercial buildings. Our commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction has made us a trusted name in the industry.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To deliver exceptional construction, design, and painting services that exceed client expectations while maintaining the highest standards of quality and professionalism.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the most trusted and preferred partner for construction and design services across the region, known for innovation, reliability, and customer-centric solutions.

experience.title: 26+ Years Experience
experience.description: Established in 1999, we bring over two decades of industry expertise

quality.title: Quality Assurance
quality.description: We use premium materials and follow best practices in every project

professionals.title: Expert Professionals
professionals.description: Skilled and certified team members dedicated to your project

timely.title: Timely Delivery
timely.description: We complete projects on schedule without compromising quality

comprehensive.title: Comprehensive Services
comprehensive.description: Construction, interior design, and painting - all under one roof

coverage.title: Wide Coverage
coverage.description: Serving intra-district, inter-city, and inter-state projects

serviceAreas.title: Our Service Areas
serviceAreas.subtitle: We undertake projects across multiple locations

cta.title: Partner With Us
cta.description: Experience the 5R Associates difference in your next project
